website_summaries.verdict: The perfect hypoallergenic backrest for buyers seeking a removable and washable pillow cover.
pros: Carry handle located at top of pillow for portability
2" longer than most sit up pillows
Includes a small pocket built in the side of armrest
cons: Does not provide much head and neck support

website_summaries.verdict: This reading pillow offers supreme comfort with soft fabric as well as impressive support.
pros: Cover can be easily removed from pillow to wash and keep fresh
Firm enough to use in bed or even on floor
Pillow retains fluffiness, even after many uses
Back, neck, and arms are well-supported with this shredded foam pillow
cons: Takes some time after opening package to fluff up pillow

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support.
customer_reviews.text: My husband had surgery and was using it in bed. Hasn’t even used it for one day and it is smashed and unsupportive. It’s also too short. We have to put another pillow on top so his head isn’t against the headboard. I am returning it and trying a taller one that also has a removable pillow on top.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Limp little thing
customer_reviews.text: It's been five days and it still is laying there small and limp. I'll never buy a bed rest again. This is small and it never "puffed" up to look like the photo. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: You'll want more than one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for my teenage daughter to use while reading and drawing. She loves the firmness of the pillow, and it makes her more comfortable while doing her reading, writing, and art activities while sitting on the bed, or on the floor. I like that the cover is easy to remove and wash. Pros: Nice color, soft fabric Easy-to-remove cover for easy washing Nice and firm, can be used to sit on the bed or on the floor Reasonable price Cons: It comes in a vacuum-sealed bag so it takes up to 2 days to fully poof up. This is on my want list for another, because it is a great reading pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mom 3

customer_reviews.title: Carcinogenic pillow
customer_reviews.text: Lounge your way to chemo treatment with this polyurethane pillow. Enjoy the toxic smell of this lovely supportive pillow while it’s polyurethane filling off gases the confuses your cellular funtion. Seriously, I unwrapped this pillow and it smelled toxic. It was disgusting. I packaged it up immediately and sent it back. Products like this are a waste of time, money, people, and the earth.
customer_reviews.author: sarah sterling

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE FOR A BAD BACK!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore it. I have scoliosis and it does great supporting my back and making me feel comfortable laying down. It is also very soft and expanded quickly after coming out the box. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TheAmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This is smaller than I expected. Would of liked it to have been taller and wider, someone of my size it will not self support. I wish the of ones are still available from when I was growing up. Walmart I noticed after getting these has some a little bugger for 14.00
customer_reviews.author: Shelley your a cunt

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this git my husband who just had major surgery. Came compressed and expanded once wrapping was removed. If I could get into any kind of box I would return. Product has an extremely strong chemical smell that permeates the room. I tried to remove cover to wash and it was impossible. Pillow stuffing has same odor so just removing and washing cover will not get rid of it. Going to the dump. Had to select a rating for each category so review would post. Never used it so can’t comment on support or comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting for the chemical smell to go away, to be able to use it.
customer_reviews.text: The foam reading pillow arrived on time. We do have a problem with the strong chemical odor from the foam, we already washed the cover, but that did not help. We have to keep it in a room that no one uses until the rain stops, then we'll try to air it outside to see if that will help. At this point in time we haven't been able to use it yet, it's only been 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Worse purchase
customer_reviews.text: This pillow came with mold in it. Please be aware, if there is a smell throuw it away. My husband I got sick from it.
customer_reviews.author: oshira

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but fabric wrinkled and terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: This came compressed in a box. You cut it open and it expands to shape which is fine except the fabric still remains wrinkled a month later. Also, it has a terrible smell that has yet to air out. I hate having my face by it. It’s comfortable but definitely some drawbacks.
customer_reviews.author: BDoH

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Plumped quickly and it's very comfy. I wanted it to use on my sofa so my 5 year-old grandson can sit next to me to read books. He has gotten too big to fit on my lap in my living room chair comfortably. I have a bad back and need support on the sofa so I can sit up better (all sofas are too deep for my short frame to be comfortable) -- this helps -- and I can grab it by the handle so easily that I will probably take it with me when I visit relative's homes too.
customer_reviews.author: Tess A.

customer_reviews.title: Good For My Back
customer_reviews.text: I use this while sitting up in the bed. I have a hurniated L5. This is also good for sitting up in chairs and the couch. It does take a day ti fill out but its pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamil Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Not to my liking
customer_reviews.text: Too lumpy and stiff. I’ve used it now about a month and find nothing good to say about it. I’ll have to throw it away as, sadly I would not gift such an item. I’m wondering why the good reviews? I think it would be possible to have good support but a softer fill in this. I don’t understand why they chose this fill, whatever it is ( feels like lumpy pellets). I’m disappointed as I need a good read-in-bed pillow and think I might have to go to a store with a door and feel what I’m buying before repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Imo

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations!!  Just what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is just what I was looking for. Watching TV and reading just got better and the neck and back pain are going to be a thing of the past. It fluffed up easily with little work and the material is soft to the touch and a great neutral off white color. I love that it has a pocket on the arm for chap stick or my phone!! I love it !!
customer_reviews.author: Bizzo

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want softness (It's not) because I specifically wanted to sit or slouch in bed to read every night. This is the ticket. I really absolutely love it. Stiff to stand up and also bridges the 4 inch gap between the mattress and wall with no problem. I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Caru

customer_reviews.title: WOW what an excellent pillow! I have a really bad back and ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW what an excellent pillow! I have a really bad back and need support when sitting and this does it all. The company is wonderful with instructions on use and following up on how you like it. Whats nice is this has a removable duvet cover that you can take off and wash. Now the only problem is keeping my friends and family from using it lol
customer_reviews.author: 4LuvofBun

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfort and support but..
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing but I am removing two stars because the cover has a noticeable yellow tint to it. It was obviously unused upon receiving it and didn't have any smell, but I was not aware that the cover had this appearance. Because of this, I will not have it out when people are around.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for feeding a baby at night!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my wife so when she's feeding our child in bed she has more support. When she got it she only had praise about how great the pillow was to feed our son at night! I should have bought this product sooner, not a high price for something that helps my wife a ton!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Krejci

customer_reviews.title: Well made but beware... its xxxtra firm!
customer_reviews.text: Product us well made and does give back support but its almost too firm and becomes uncomfortable if using for a while. Had hoped it would soften up a bit after usage but it hasnt at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Grieshaber

customer_reviews.title: Nice price...nice pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy in a small apartment, so my bed doubles as my sofa. This pillow is the binding tie...very comfortable, and easy to push to the side when it's time to sleep. Not sure why some folks complained about it not having enough filling...mine fluffed up to perfection! Just right. My only wish is that it came in more colors than just the off-white. Very happy customer...another one of those items that makes you wonder what other great inventions are out there to discover. Lol! I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike "Sonic" Meengs

customer_reviews.title: This is A GREAT PRODUCT, MEETS ALL YOUR NEEDS IF YOU HAVE BACK PROBLEMS ETC..
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I was amazed because it came vacuum sealed...and I thought no way is this thing going to expand to the size I wanted and comfort/support I was expecting. It shocked me and I love it. Great quality you can take cover off and machine wash on cold then zip it back on sturdy and soft fabric..
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Angrisano Ladner

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a rock!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pillow following a surgical procedure that required sleeping in a sitting position. This pillow was like sleeping on a rock. I tried all of their suggestions to "fluff" up the shredded foam but nothing worked. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This pillow when arrived smelt extremely toxic, and for some reasons the manufacturer on the tags instructs not to wash the pillow...
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Life changer
customer_reviews.text: Where has this pillow been all my life?? If you like to read, work or really any activity sitting up in bed this pillow is perfect. I also have a spot on my couch that sags and this pillow is perfect for that as well. I want to buy another one just so I don't have to drag it from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great reading pillow for children and maybe even adults
customer_reviews.text: Got this reading pillow from my granddaughter who is an avid reader. She loves to lay on her back on the floor or in bed reading for extended periods of time and often with her cat snuggled up with her. She's used a variety of pillows, towels, blankets, etc. to prop her head up. Those options seemed to work so-so. As a child I had done the same and one Christmas Santa brought me a reading pillow similar to this one though without arms. When I saw this pillow I thought that is what she needs. I got it and she loves it carrying it around the house to read wherever she wants. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: JamesH

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I expected for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased back rests in the past and they were good quality for my money, this one however was no more than a pillow would give and extremely lumpy. It was the weirdest thing Ive ever seen in a back rest. Its as though someone stuffed it with balls of paper. Not worth the money what so ever, and I wouldn't even pay one dollar for it at a store.
customer_reviews.author: Elise McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pillow to help me post a major medical procedure I am having. It’s perfect. It does have a smell when you first open it, but dissipates after about 24 hours. I am quite smell sensitive, but it doesn’t bother me. Supportive. Comfy. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Stained and Smells. UPDATED REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: Huge black stain right out of the box. Also smells like really strong chemicals. Care tag says not to wash pillow or cover. Dissapointed, but it has already "fluffed" up alot, so I can't get it back in the box. UPDATED 5/31 Received new pillow in the mail. No stains or marks, but still has a smell. I left the new one outside to air out while it fluffed up and it barely has a smell after a few hours. Pillow is really supportive and has a very soft cover!
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Give it some time to be amazing.
customer_reviews.text: So I got it and honestly at first I wasn't impressed. The stuffing was all compact together and a disappointing combination between really stiff in some places but also really floppy in the arms, it didn't seem as sturdy as I was hoping. But I figured whatevs I'll try it and see if it sucks. So I fluffed it up a bit and now it's my favorite. It just needed some time. Soft enough to be cozy and firm enough to be useful. I also love the side pocket, I keep my anti blue light glasses in it so when I'm on my laptop late at night I can go to sleep afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: check the size
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is excellent, it arrived on time and I am using it as I type this. So far I like it a lot, however it is a bit smaller than I thought it would be which is my fault for not checking the measurements more carefully. If I am still enjoying it in a few weeks as much as I am now I will keep it for other uses and order a larger one for my TV watching time.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy O

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the product, it had a very strong chemical smell. I removed the slip cover and tried airing it out for a week or so but that did not help. I then tried Fabreeze Fabric spray. That did not help. I then tried to wash it even though you're not supposed to wash it. It removed about 75% of the smell. So I tried washing it one more time but this time the product burst open in the washer. I am now looking for a similar product from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Comeau

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is really nice. The cover is super soft
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is really nice. The cover is super soft. I was a little apprehensive with the color since it was for mu son, but it isn't really white, it's more of a vanilla color. Compliments the décor in room very nicely. The pillow arrived vacuum packed, so it was very flat. It took a few days to puff up to the actual size. Now that it has it its very comfortable. My son really likes the pillow, it was just what he was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, supportive, tall enough to support your neck.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking far and wide for a comfortable and supportive back rest pillow and this is it! It's high enough to support my neck when I'm working on my laptop or reading on my IPad. I will be buying more for other family members.
customer_reviews.author: ValVZB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good pillow
customer_reviews.text: Actually a pretty decent pillow. The only reason for 4 stars is because you need to punch and fluff it after each use so it will be in the correct shape next time. But otherwise its great. I use it daily and it goes right back into shape each time after fluffing.
customer_reviews.author: Julana Holscher

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver pillow
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one day after surgery to help me sit up and sleep in a more comfortable position since it was to hard to lay flat. It was my bestie😍 during the entire 8 weeks of recovery. Make sure you follow the directions & let it sit for the allotted time before using it; this will help it maintain the integrity of the support and yet remain soft & plush to the feel.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Fight to the death
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pillow. I purchased it for my son for his birthday. We now fight for it on a daily basis. I will be getting another one soon ! I had absolutely NO issues with this product at all. It was at its original size within hours and we had no issues with smell. This pillow was definitely worth it and now a family favorite !
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with Appearance
customer_reviews.text: No complaints on quality; however, not as comfortable to use as I had hoped. I am always seeking the perfect support tool for use in bedtime reading. Don’t let my Goldilocks’ attitude dissuade you from purchasing. While I will continue to search for Just Right I suspect most will find this product Just Fine.
customer_reviews.author: SommaGood SommaNot

customer_reviews.title: Where was this pillow made and under what conditions?
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to find a pillow I could use while reading in bed. Unfortunately, after using for ten days I noticed tiny red spots on my face. My daughter said she thought it looked like bites. The only change in my life was the new pillow. To see if that was the problem I stopped using it for two weeks and the bites cleared up. So, again I tried the pillow and after five days the bites returned. Not sure what is in this pillow but I can't use it and it is past the return to the manufacturer dates, so I guess I am out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful support and very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this back support. It is very very comfortable and study. I was concerned it may have a lumpy appearance but it doesn't. It took a couple of days to completely fluff up to full size after coming out of the package but it is well worth the wait. The material is thick and durable. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: MommaDawnF

customer_reviews.title: Smelled like mildew
customer_reviews.text: Smelled like mildew when it arrived. Brought for ill family member who needed it right away so having to wait 48hrs for it to fully form was not worth it. Returned and brought from store
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great back in chair or bed
customer_reviews.text: I love it hits my back good, very very comfortable and helps my back David in my hospital bed But if you buy a light colored one like I did buy an extra case to go so you can change it with Jack’s what I’m gonna do that if that happens you can’t go wrong with this it really helps your back my mother had one years ago I can see why now great just great
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Curry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, excellent back support
customer_reviews.text: Ahhhhhh, my back is very happy and my left leg is ever so grateful. This is the perfect pillow for beds. Obviously, that's what I use it for. It's soft and comfortable and I have already told my friends who were thinking of getting one that it's exactly what they want.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L E It

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made cover
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is sturdy and the cover is soft, but the cover has completely fallen apart in multiple places. The pillow is rarely moved or used so this is not a sign of overuse, but one of poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Devin MCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfy
customer_reviews.text: It is very flat when it comes out of the bag but it does get firm after a few days. The downside is, it’s too firm. I was hoping it would be softer and more comfortable but it’s pretty hard.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Lumpy
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get it but sadly disappointed. The material seemed cheap and it was very lumpy and kind of uncomfortable. I like the idea that you could remove the cover and wash it but, unfortunately, it was a miss for me.
customer_reviews.author: Picklebelly

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality and no comfort
customer_reviews.text: Terrible pillow. There’s no support. It isn’t comfortable at all, poor quality, it smell like chemicals... Was looking for a pillow for back support to use postpartum, returned this and found one from Ugg (at Bed Bath & Beyond) which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great back support
customer_reviews.text: My mom recently broke her back and this pillow provides great support. It’s very stiff and sturdy which is amazing to help keep her upright without sinking into the pillow. It came in a vacuum sealed bag with the instructions to let it sit out for a couple days so it can grow, I didn’t have patience so I just shook it and hit it until it was a normal size. It didn’t have any smell or anything. It’s really a great pillow if you’re looking for sturdy back support.
customer_reviews.author: Esli Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't keep its shape well. As a result, it is less supportive than I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Prop up pillow
customer_reviews.text: I do not like it as much as I thought I would. Service was terrific. Pillow is really hard. I guess I expected something I would sink into.
customer_reviews.author: Rodie Zubrack

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I had to return. It had a horrible smell to it that just would not go away
customer_reviews.author: Toni Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Really great reading pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I don't often leave reviews but I had to share how much I like this reading pillow. It's wonderful! It is supportive but soft. I was using several pillows to prop myself self up to read and my back was really hurting. This chair solved all of that. I do need to use a small pillow at the base because it helps my back but that isn't necessary.
customer_reviews.author: HippyChick

customer_reviews.title: really nice piece. very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: really nice piece. very soft and comfortable. i glad i picked this one. get what you pay for. only con: a selection of colors. this ones a very light yellow. ok in my bedroom. im sure the fellas would give me rash of shit if they saw it on the couch. just sayin... larry
customer_reviews.author: larry seltzer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the house or dorm room. Our daughter used it throughout the Thanksgiving weekend and took it back to college to use in her dorm room. Yes, it starts out really flat. I gave it about 12 hours before I 'fluffed it' some. After 48 hours (in 62 degree house) it looked great. I like that the cover is washable.
customer_reviews.author: SarahDee

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely NOT white
customer_reviews.text: The first two pictures in the description of the pillow show the pillow to be white, though the pillow is described as vanilla. I just received the pillow today and this is definitely cream colored. I've searched the internet for approximately three weeks for a white one as my 2 duvet covers are white and sage green. My 3 sheet sets are sage green, white, and another set is blue and white. This will have to do. It's close enough to white, but definitely not as "pure snow white" as shown in the top 2 pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Maria F.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, firm pillow.
customer_reviews.text: It arrives all squished in a vacuum bag. Rest assured, after a day or so, it plumps up to be a very firm pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many reading pillows through the decades but this is the first one with a removable, washable cover. This is a real bonus feature! Also, the color is not white it is a very pale yellow, like the color of margarine. It just happens to perfectly match our bedding. The velour fabric is very soft and the pillow provides very good back support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but smell
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Comfortable pillows but they have a horrible smell. I can't keep in my room they cause headaches
customer_reviews.author: Christina Erp

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Got this pillow to sit on the floor and lean against the wall. The pillow never actually stretched out all the way and all the ripped up foam just falls to the bottom. The pillow is soft but the filling just fills maybe half the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I wish this would have been bigger... just too small to do the job I wanted. I was looking for something that would be comfortable enough to allow sleeping upright (had surgery), but this product isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Photomandan

customer_reviews.title: Nice but very small
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small pillow the arms are just decorative, should be sold as child furniture. Purchased it for recovery from hip surgery so it does let me sit up straight but no place for arms.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, nice soft fabric
customer_reviews.text: Very tightly packaged so be careful opening with a blade. Poofed up nicely, the poly smell wore off in a couple of days. Has a fully accessible complete zipper unlike the one I had previously owned.
customer_reviews.author: CC from Kirkland (Seattle's Riviera)

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't use because it smelled so bad. Airing it out didn't help
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Roberts

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: its nice but It is not useful for me. My bed is too soft(memory foam) to support me properly in a sitting position.
customer_reviews.author: carmen o'connor

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is perfect the quality is outstanding it is everything I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is perfect the quality is outstanding it is everything I was looking for and more thank you for making my life so much easier and helping my back and easing the pain
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Good Option For Reading in Bed
customer_reviews.text: Nice back rest for beds without backboards. Comfortable, not too big, and firm enough.
customer_reviews.author: brick house

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Investment
customer_reviews.text: I am preparing for extensive shoulder surgery and this is the perfect pillow that will allow me to sleep in a sitting position comfortably. It is wonderful! Judi L., Prescott, AZ
customer_reviews.author: J. Liscombe

customer_reviews.title: Good back support and I like it because the cover ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my college freshman son and he loves it. Good back support and I like it because the cover can be removed and washed. I never realized how hard these are to find once the kids move off to college. A seasonal item for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for nursing baby in bed
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this pillow and they were pleasantly met, even exceeded. I keep it in my bed for middle of the night feedings with my newborn. It is incredibly comfortable and supportive. It makes it so I don't have to worry about hurting my back and I can focus on the baby.
customer_reviews.author: AliKat

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Basically a laundry bag stuffed with carpet remnants. Misshapen, bulky in all the wrong places. Wouldn’t use if it were free.
customer_reviews.author: lots of fun

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Terrible purchase no support and terrible form. Would not buy again. A total waste of my hard earned cash.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Stewart

customer_reviews.title: The cover feel so warm and it's not super soft but it support my back
customer_reviews.text: The cover feel so warm and it's not super soft but it support my back
customer_reviews.author: Geric S. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would get softer after a few days. If you want to lay on a piece of comfortable fabric full of chunks of cardboard and cotton this is your pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Works great for sitting up in bed
customer_reviews.text: Works great for watching TV or if you need to sleep sitting up.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Capistrant

customer_reviews.title: Pillow is smaller than appears in photo
customer_reviews.text: I love the firmness and support of this reading pillow. The photo makes them look bigger so I was surprised to get such a small box with the pillow stuffed inside. Once I let the pillow rest, it fluffed up, but it's still not as big as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Laina Scivally

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: It came in an off white/cream color and definitely a different material than described/pictured but still very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Raponey

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pillow. My kids steal it from each others ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pillow. My kids steal it from each others room because it is so comfortable and sturdy. I would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: MikesDork

customer_reviews.title: ' The reading pillow arrived early and was securely packaged ...
customer_reviews.text: ' The reading pillow arrived early and was securely packaged. It provides soft support, and the removable, washable cover is a real bonus.’
customer_reviews.author: JKyzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and firm but easily adjustable. Fluffs up nicely.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this pillow. Easy to adjust and is nice and firm. I wish I would ha e bought this a long time ago!!! It's PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mouse

customer_reviews.title: I love using this to sit up in bed and watch TV.
customer_reviews.text: I love it and it's so comfortable!! I've even fell asleep sitting up watching TV!! That's how comfortable it is!!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Blowars

customer_reviews.title: wonderful pillow
customer_reviews.text: I suffer back ache and this pillow helps me ease the pain and to be able to seat on the bed with no problem as I wasnt before and so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Hassuey J.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not for tall people. I am 5’9” and this doesn’t even come up to my shoulders
customer_reviews.text: I would not consider this “tall” size reading pillow. Strong smell. The memory foam is pretty average. I will keep only because it would be a hassle to return but I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever did for myself
customer_reviews.text: Support is firm and upright, which I wanted. Arms may be short, but I don't use them a lot. Much more comfortable than the pillows I was trying to use. Only thing I would change is the vanilla color. Very pretty but I'd have preferred something a little darker. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S.

customer_reviews.title: It adds to my happiness
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I use it to watch tv in bed and it is so comfortable behind me. It is just what I wanted for propping up
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Vest

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Not at all comfortable. Box of rocks would have been considered soft in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to fluff out but once it does, it is so soft and supportive. I'm finally back in bed after having my baby and it's because of how great this pillow is. It allows me to nurse with comfort and support, unlike the backboard of my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She could not be on her feet for 8 to 12 weeks and was very pleased to use it during that time for aid in ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and gave it to her when she had surgery on her ankle. She could not be on her feet for 8 to 12 weeks and was very pleased to use it during that time for aid in reading, watching TV and eating, and /or just to have another position in the bed while her ankle healed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smelled pillow
customer_reviews.text: The pillow has a terrible odor. It’s making my sister sick Diane Thornton
customer_reviews.author: Diane G.Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Not the white color advertised in the picture. More like a cream/pink color. Would not have ordered if I had known. Completely clashes with my bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Does not mold to my back - is not comfortable at all
customer_reviews.author: imaginative person

customer_reviews.title: Choose a different backrest
customer_reviews.text: It's extremely hard. Very uncomfortable. I'm returning it. It smells bad too (but I think it's from the memory like foam and may go away).
customer_reviews.author: C. Doerr

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: This product is a bit hard and not very comfortable but for the price, it' does the job. My daughter actually has taken it over so at least it's getting used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This helps me prop up better in bed watching tv. I love it! Easy to fluff up and it is not flimsy. It holds its shape. Love that you can wash the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this! The color is exactly like he photo ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this! The color is exactly like he photo which matches a blanket and pillows I have at home so it was perfect! That price for the quality is a steal! We love it! My husband everyday I kid you not says how comfortable it is!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Corey

customer_reviews.title: NOT what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought the pillow was very uncomfortable, I did not like the texture of the fabric-Was not happy at all. First time this happens to me with Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Maru

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. It supports my back. The little pocket for my phone is convenient but it came with a chemical smell. I washed the cover & the smell left but I'm soo allergic to the pillow. I have to keep a sheet draped over it 😔
customer_reviews.author: Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Took a day or two to fluff out completely but well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is great
customer_reviews.text: It was packed compressed, and expanded pretty quickly. The foam is sturdy and the slip cover is so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Janie from Sylvania

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy high-backed sitting pillow.
customer_reviews.text: This is so comfortable and has little pockets for incidentals. Very well made. Cover is removable for washing.
customer_reviews.author: quite the crow

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Color is a little different than the picture. More of an off white cream color but very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Lemieszek

customer_reviews.title: Incredible purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I had one growing up and could not wait to get it to try it out again. It is perfect anywhere, the bedroom living room on the floor. The kids and I could not say anything bad about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Keen Edge Home Reading Pillow with Arms and Pocket - Shredded Memory Foam - Read and Watch TV in Comfort While in Bed, Sitting, Lounge and Relax Without Back Pain with Support, Large Backrest/Husband
product_meta.description: Our Reading are great to use when watching TV, relaxing and reading your book and more. The pillow design features a high backrest and armrests on both sides so you can sit comfortably in the bed. Our pillowcases are detachable and feature 100% velvet fabric for added softness, quality and durability. This 100% hypoallergenic crushed sponge filler will provide comfort and stability while giving you a soft, relaxing feel. Our versatile pillows can be used for comfort and functionality in any room in a variety of applications.
feature_bullets: UNLIKE OTHER PILLOWS - Our Pillows will give you perfect support. Not Flimsy and will hold up over time. 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - So you don’t have to wonder if you are risking your hard-earned money. If you don’t love it just let us know. We take great pride in taking care of our awesome customers.

BINGE WATCH YOUR SHOWS LIKE A QUEEN - Find a quiet place, locate your favorite Netflix show, fetch some snacks and relax into your new husband pillow. Or Situp in bed with great support & comfort. It’s time for you to take some ‘me’ time, position your new reading pillow, hang the DO NOT DISTURB sign and relax.
YOUR BACK WILL THANK YOU - Perfect for Adults & Kids. After 1-2 days your new arm rest cushion will ‘magically’ expand molding to your body providing you with the back support you crave.
GET THROUGH MORE PAGES - Grab your favorite book or study. Use the handy carry handle of your new bedrest pillow to carry it to your secret hideaway.
EASY TO CLEAN, REMOVABLE COVER - Spillages are no longer a problem - we've got your back! The soft velour cover of your arm pillow is easily removed and machine washable!
